channel.title: Making a quest complete interface 508
channel.description:
i've been trying to make this long scroll pop up with writing on it but, when i use the code under it just shows it in the chat interface section. Does anyone know the code to make it popup on the screen like the quest completed interface.
[code]p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 227);[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 07:12:41 pm[/size][hr]NVM figured it out ^^
[code]p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);[/code]

item.title: Making a quest complete interface 508
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:

iâ€™ve been trying to make this long scroll pop up with writing on it but, when i use the code under it just shows it in the chat interface section. Does anyone know the code to make it popup on the screen like the quest completed interface.

p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 227);[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 07:12:41 pm[/size][hr]NVM figured it out ^^
